remarks: Existence of an ordered pair abstraction, deduction version. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 19-Oct-2017.)
statement:
opabex3d.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. _V ) $.
opabex3d.2 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. A ) -> { y | ps } e. _V ) $.
opabex3d $p |- ( ph -> { <. x , y >. | ( x e. A /\ ps ) } e. _V ) $.
$d A x y $.
$d ph x $.
